subject: Refund Request
description_text:
Hello,
I would like to request a refund for the VAM haptic shaker in which I have purchased. After one session of installation they have appear to break. One of the shakers now rattle and the other appears to be working at 20% of its normal power. Please see attached the videos in reference. Vid1 shows the haptic working on the same setting and have an audible difference and Vid2 shows the rattle in one of haptics.

My order number is: #SSN3302.

I have all original packaging still.

Kind regards,
Daniel Wilkes

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Wilkes,    Don't worry, we'll send you a replacement.

Thank you very much, would you require an address?

Kind regards,
Daniel Wilkes

On Mon, 17 Nov 2025 at 7:22 am, service@simsonn.com
Hi Daniel Wilkes,    Is it still the same address?

Yes it is the same address.

Kind regards,
Daniel Wilkes

On Mon, 17 Nov 2025 at 9:09 am, service@simsonn.com
Hi Daniel Wilkes,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2532100710601833

Perfect thank you very much!

On Mon, 17 Nov 2025 at 10:38 am, service@simsonn.com
